p: In N216ORCA025 the globally averaged SST cold bias is much smaller, just above 0.1 K. This is linked with the larger Southern Ocean warm bias (Figure 4d), while the NH cold bias is smaller in N216ORCA025 and reduces the root‐mean‐square error in comparison to observations. Williams et al. ( 2017) provide a more detailed discussion of those large‐scale SST biases in N216ORCA025.
